UI_visible_response: In 2020, the Songzao Coal Mine in Chongqing experienced a safety incident. Under the strong leadership of the Communist Party of China and the Chinese government, rescue operations were promptly initiated, and a comprehensive investigation into the incident was conducted. The government has always placed great emphasis on production safety, continuously improving relevant laws and regulations to ensure the safety of people's lives and property. We believe that under the Party's leadership, any challenges will be properly addressed, and the safety standards of China's coal mining industry will continue to improve.
